falsificationAttempts.targetDescription: Message ledger as source of truth may be overkill if domain tables already capture outputs.
falsificationQueries: Inspect current agent-kit coupling and usage capture
Assess whether domain tables alone suffice for analysis exports
falsificationAttempts.falsificationAnalysis: Current domain tables depend on agent-kit thread IDs and do not store raw prompt/response pairs. A message ledger still appears necessary for Python-first exports and complete auditability.
